RÉSUMÉ  
DANG PHUOC BINH 
PERSONAL INFORMATION  
Birthday: February 25th, 1990 
Gender: Male 
Address:  285/3/9 Vo Thi Sau, Phu Dong commune, Nhon Trach district,  Dong Nai 
provide 
Phone number: +84768103435 
E-mail: dpbinh252@gmail.com 
Skype: dpbinh252 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• I have studied C++/C#/PHP/VB.Net/Java/Sql languages in university 
• Have solid fundamental of OOP, MVC, MVVM, Java core, extended stuffs 
such as XML. 
• Experience in data structure and design patterns. 
• Experience in Maven, Spring, Hibernate, Redis, RabbitMQ. 
• Experience in SQL Server, MySQL. 
• Experience with various skills like Html, Css, Javascript  
WORK SKILLS  
• English: Be able to communicate with the others via chat, email. 
• Be familiar with develop tools such as Jira, Crucible and Confluence, teamcity. 
• Be familiar with Eclipse IDE, Intellij, Visual Studio, SVN and GIT. 
• Be comfortable with Ubuntu OS 
WORK HISTORY 
• Java developer – Contentnet ( January 2018 Present ) 
• Support tool developer - Vietinbank bank ( December 2015 – December 2017 ) 
• Java developer – TMA Solution ( November 2013 – December 2015 ) 
2 
PROJECTS ATTEENDED 
DESCRIPTION 
TECHNOLOGIES 
AMS ( TMA Solution ) 
(This is a single project I have worked for 2 years) 
It combines 2 parts a client and a server to manage 
status, upgrade software of the Network Element (NE) 
such as GPON, ISAM and their relatives via SNMP 
protocol. 
My duties is fix bugs and develop new feature for 
Backup/Restore and Software Management component. 
Backup/restore respond for backup and restore NE 
software and information for that NE, Software 
management respond for install or uninstall NE Software 
on NE. 
-

Eclipse RCP 
Portable Thermal Print without Driver ( Vietinbank ) 
Combine 2 parts runtime service and UI 
Application. 
Runtime Service is a service on window, it will 
waiting and receive command via socket connection, then 
translate that command to hexacode and send it to thermal 
printer. 
UI application is a UI interface to interact with user 
to get data and build command and send to Service via 
socket connection. We have so many UI application like 
SEC Printer, Receipt Voucher Printer ….  
- 
C# 
- 
Window Service 
- 
WPF 
- 
MVVM 
- 
Log4Net 
Capture Lync Message System ( Vietinbank ) 
Combine 3 parts client runtime service, center 
server and administrator web interface. 
Client is a runtime background application that will 
capture Lync message and attach file and then stored in 
local temp, the temp file was encoded, and all temp data 
will be send to server at next login. 
Server get data from client and store it along with 
that sent user. The message will be filter to find out bad 
message and report it. 
Administrator monitoring by web interface, can 
filter by time, search by content and get restore old file 
which was sent.

Sell Support App on IOS ( Vietinbank) 
App combines 2 parts iOS client app and web 
service server. 
IOS app is an application (iPad) support for sell 
department, show sell information, file, achiverments… 
all data is stored in local which will be sync when device 
get connected to network. 
Web Service is a Restful service to provide data for 
iOS client application.

The video sharing platform, separated videos by

videos from the internet, and user can upload heavy video 
to this system.
